member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingCollection`1.MergeChanges(`0@,`0)
member.summary: Merge changed child items into the original trackable entity. This assumes GetChanges was called to update only changed items. Non-recursive - only direct children will be merged. Usage: MergeChanges(ref originalItem, updatedItem);
member.param: Local entity containing unchanged child items.
Entity returned by an update operation.
